title: Old Heritage House near Midigama
location: 30 minutes south of Galle Fort, Midigama
details: In need of a complete renovation this very attractive property is set in 6 acres of mature tropical trees and vegetation. It could be easily transformed in to an amazing residence if you added a swimming pool extensions to the house itself, a tennis court and so on. Well located just 5 mins drive to Midigama beach, fabulous rice paddy views, all in all an amazing property.
